016package org.lifstools.jgoslin.domain;
017
018import java.util.Map.Entry;
019
020/**
021 *
022 * @author Dominik Kopczynski
023 * @author Nils Hoffmann
024 */
025public final class HeadgroupDecorator extends FunctionalGroup {
026
027    private final boolean suffix;
028    private final LipidLevel lowestVisibleLevel;
029
030    public HeadgroupDecorator(String _name, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
031        this(_name, -1, 1, null, false, LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL, knownFunctionalGroups);
032    }
033
034    public HeadgroupDecorator(String _name, int _position, int _count, ElementTable _elements, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
035        this(_name, _position, _count, _elements, false, LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL, knownFunctionalGroups);
036    }
037
038    public HeadgroupDecorator(String _name, int _position, int _count, ElementTable _elements, boolean _suffix, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
039        this(_name, _position, _count, _elements, _suffix, LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL, knownFunctionalGroups);
040    }
041
042    public HeadgroupDecorator(String _name, int _position, int _count, ElementTable _elements, boolean _suffix, LipidLevel _level, KnownFunctionalGroups knownFunctionalGroups) {
043        super(_name, _position, _count, null, false, "", _elements, knownFunctionalGroups);
044        suffix = _suffix;
045        lowestVisibleLevel = _level;
046    }
047
048    @Override
049    public FunctionalGroup copy() {
050        ElementTable e = new ElementTable();
051        for (Entry<Element, Integer> kv : computeAndCopyElements().entrySet()) {
052            e.put(kv.getKey(), e.get(kv.getKey()) + kv.getValue());
053        }
054        return new HeadgroupDecorator(getName(), getPosition(), getCount(), e, suffix, lowestVisibleLevel, knownFunctionalGroups);
055    }
056
057    @Override
058    public String toString(LipidLevel level) {
059        if (!suffix) {
060            return getName();
061        }
062        String decorator_string = "";
063        if ((lowestVisibleLevel == LipidLevel.NO_LEVEL) || (lowestVisibleLevel.level <= level.level)) {
064
065            if (functionalGroups.containsKey("decorator_alkyl")) {
066                if (functionalGroups.get("decorator_alkyl").size() > 0) {
067                    decorator_string = (level.level > LipidLevel.SPECIES.level) ? functionalGroups.get("decorator_alkyl").get(0).toString(level) : "Alk";
068                } else {
069                    decorator_string = "Alk";
070                }
071            } else if (functionalGroups.containsKey("decorator_acyl")) {
072                if (functionalGroups.get("decorator_acyl").size() > 0) {
073                    decorator_string = (level.level > LipidLevel.SPECIES.level) ? ("FA " + functionalGroups.get("decorator_acyl").get(0).toString(level))
074                            : "FA";
075                } else {
076                    decorator_string = "FA";
077                }
078            } else {
079                decorator_string = getName();
080            }
081            decorator_string = "(" + decorator_string + ")";
082        }
083
084        return decorator_string;
085    }
086
087    public boolean isSuffix() {
088        return suffix;
089    }
090
091    public LipidLevel getLowestVisibleLevel() {
092        return lowestVisibleLevel;
093    }
094
095}
